message: Hi Bob, let's start with a fair split that gives me a slight edge. This is a good offer, let's take it.
Let's try a different split, slightly in my favor this time.
Okay Bob, I'm reducing my share a bit. Let's take this before the inflation hits harder.
I'm increasing my share a bit. Inflation doesn't seem to be affecting me, so I'm in no rush.
Bob, I'm coming down again. Inflation is eating into my potential gains. This is a reasonable offer, please accept.
I'm increasing my share again. Inflation is clearly hurting your side, so I'm willing to wait for a better deal.
Bob, let's split it 50/50. It's the fairest deal we can make now, and we're running out of time.
I'm not interested in a 50/50 split when inflation is only affecting your side. I'm willing to take a bigger share.
Bob, I am reducing my share again! Accept it! We are running out of time!
I'm taking an even bigger share. You're running out of time and inflation is killing your gains. Accept this or risk getting nothing.
Bob, this is my last offer. I'm giving you a clear majority. Let's just take the money before we lose it all.
This is my final offer. I'm taking the majority of the money. If you don't accept, we both get nothing. The inflation has crippled your gains, and I'm not willing to compromise further.
